prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The Book language is a subset of markdown designed to be easily readable by both humans and machines. It uses .book file extension and UTF-8 encoding. There are two variants: flat (single prompt) and full (structured with tasks, commands, and prompts).

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
